CustomField.description: 0 - Has no record of media offerings on campus (do not recommend) 1 - Has media, R&B might not have purchased directly (very low priority, might not have enough media options) 2 - Has Media offerings, responsive contact that we can depend on 3 - Several Media offerings, responsive, solid contact 4 - Supportive contact who we can lean on for multiple media opportunities
CustomField.inlineHelpText: 0 - Has no record of media offerings on campus (do not recommend) 1 - Has media, R&B might not have purchased directly (very low priority, might not have enough media options) 2 - Has Media offerings, responsive contact that we can depend on 3 - Several Media offerings, responsive, solid contact 4 - Supportive contact who we can lean on for multiple media opportunities
CustomField.label: Media Ranking
